name: Minimum Viable Project v.1
description:
This is my first Minimum Viable Product or Prototype for a video game made with RPG Maker MV. I ask everyone who play this game to give suggestions or opinions what could be better for battle system or shop or to said what he likes in this project.

You can see so far:

- Battle System with Potions/Items (Don't use Attack Button)

- Shop where you can buy them with Gold you get from the battles and Level Ups

- Boss fight (Too easy for now)

- Crafting System (Just for 2 Items so far)

In next version will make more things and will fix some problems if you suggested about them.
